nodes.bodyText: Does that one throw the exception? It needs proxying?

That code wasn't throwing an exception, as it was only storing a DummyEntity. If the test would have attempted to load it, you'd have had a runtime exception.
That seemed wrong to me (in many ways), so I made sure we throw an helpful (but fatal) error at build time to highlight the need for an empty constructor. Since it fails now, existing tests had to be fixed.
